entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:12 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers. High 7. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 2. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
